venue.name: Greenley Pond Trail TH Parking Lot

item.description:
I'm planning to hike two 4K footers, East Osceola (4156 ft) & Osceola (4340 ft) on Sep 17(Sat).   When I hiked Osceolas last year, I hiked from Tripoli Rd by taking Mt Osceola Trail toward NorthEast.  This time, I'd like to start hiking from Kanc by taking Greenley Pond Tr since Kanc is fully re-opened now.  Per WHITES Mtn NF web page, it appears Greenley Pond Trail is partially closed from lower Greenley Pond to Livermore Rd, but, it doesn't affect the hiking toward Osceolas.  White Mtn Guidebook says Greenley Ponds are beautiful. So we may want to stop by after Osceola hiking before heading back to the Parking Lot on Kanc.

 

There are nice ledges at Osceola where we can eat lunch with great view!

 

Hiking Description:

* We meet at Greenley Ponds Trail TH Parking Lot at 9AM on Kancamagus Highway.

* We will start hiking no later than 9:15AM.

* Trails we use:

   Greenley Ponds Trail: 1.3 Miles

   Mt Osceola Trail: 1.5 Miles to reach East Osceola

   Mt Osceola Trail: 1.0 mile to reach Osceola

   Re-trace same trails back to the parking lot at Kanc. (we may want to stop by Greenley Ponds to see nice view)

* This is approx. 7.6 miles RT Hike.  If we go to Greenley Ponds after Osceola Hike, it'll add  1 mile or so. 

* I'd like to hike with Slow to Moderate pace (1.5 to 2 mph in average).  If we do this, we can expect to complete this hike by 2 to 3 PM-ish.

 

Rules to follow:

* Please don't bring your friends who are NOT the member of this meetup group as I need to make sure no liability as well as hikers capability who are going to join my hike in advance.

* When you sign up this event, you'll be asked several questions such that I can get to know your hiking experience if I haven't hiked with you yet.  Otherwise, to answer to my questions are NOT an optional.  When you sign up w/o answering my questions, I may remove you from On-Going list at any time.

* I do not prefer "No Show" after you signing up.  Please make sure to update your RSVP when your plan has changed.  Or if you're not really sure if you can join, please wait for signing up until you're for sure as I don't have to see "maybe hiker's RSVP". 

 

Weather Check Point:

Weather check point will be done on Sep 16th (Fri), 7PM.  

 

 Note:  At the higher elevation, temp might be colder than you assume.  Please don't underestimate the cold weather in higher elevation and make sure to bring appropriate gear such as waterproof/windproof jacket (in case of rain) etc.   Please bring enough water, snack and lunch.  Needless to say, please bring your headlamp, although I'm pretty sure we'll be back to the trailhead before getting dark.

If you have any questions, please feel free to drop me an email.

 

Assistant Organizer, (and Hike/Snowshoe in Vermont! Meetup Group Organizer)

Tomoko Nakajima

 

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: My Car is Honda CR-V(Blue, VT plate)
item.name: East Osceola & Mt Osceola (Moderate/Intermediate)
